<a id="class_UPNPDevice"></a>

# UPNPDevice

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) device.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) device. See [UPNP](class_upnp.md) for UPnP discovery and utility functions. Provides low-level access to UPNP control commands. Allows to manage port mappings (port forwarding) and to query network information of the device (like local and external IP address and status). Note that methods on this class are synchronous and block the calling thread.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_UPNPDevice_method_add_port_mapping"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **add_port_mapping**\ (\ port\: [int](class_int.md), port_internal\: [int](class_int.md) = 0, desc\: [String](class_string.md) = "", proto\: [String](class_string.md) = "UDP", duration\: [int](class_int.md) = 0\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_UPNPDevice_method_add_port_mapping)

Adds a port mapping to forward the given external port on this **UPNPDevice** for the given protocol to the local machine. See [UPNP.add_port_mapping()](class_upnp.md#class_UPNP_method_add_port_mapping).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_UPNPDevice_method_delete_port_mapping"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **delete_port_mapping**\ (\ port\: [int](class_int.md), proto\: [String](class_string.md) = "UDP"\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_UPNPDevice_method_delete_port_mapping)

Deletes the port mapping identified by the given port and protocol combination on this device. See [UPNP.delete_port_mapping()](class_upnp.md#class_UPNP_method_delete_port_mapping).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_UPNPDevice_method_is_valid_gateway"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_valid_gateway**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_UPNPDevice_method_is_valid_gateway)

Returns ``true`` if this is a valid IGD (InternetGatewayDevice) which potentially supports port forwarding.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_UPNPDevice_method_query_external_address"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](class_string.md) **query_external_address**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_UPNPDevice_method_query_external_address)

Returns the external IP address of this **UPNPDevice** or an empty string.
